00093 enum StepperState
00094 {
00095     MSTS_UNINIT,        
00096     MSTS_RUN,           
00097     MSTS_IDLE,

00099     MSTS_PRERUN,

00103     MSTS_INIT,

00106     MSTS_OUTHOME,       
00107 
00108     MSTS_ERROR,         
00109 
00111     MSTS_DUMMY_ALIGN = STEPPER_MAX_STATES - 1
00112 };
